ProductQualification.name: ProductQualification
ProductQualification.description: Represents qualification rules for products. The rules determine when the product qualifies to be displayed to users. The rules are based on user context.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from which the qualification rule for the product comes into effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date to which the qualification rule for the product ceases to be in effect.

IsQualified.description: Indicates whether the product is qualified based on the qualification rules (true) or not (false). For a product to qualify, this field should be true.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product qualification record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product qualification record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product qualification record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product qualification record.

ParentProductId.description: The ID of the immediate parent product in the product bundle hierarchy.

ProductId.description: The product for which the qualification rule is defined.

RootProductId.description: The ID of the root product in the product bundle hierarchy.
